text: "A Springfield Summer Christmas for Christmas" is the 10th episode of the 32nd season of The Simpsons. It was first shown on the Fox network on December 13, 2020. The episode was written by Jessica Conard. Timothy Bailey is the director of the episode. Ellie Kemper and Richard Kind are guest stars for the episode. == References == == Other websites == * Category:The Simpsons (season 32) episodes Category:2020 television episodes
title: A Springfield Summer Christmas for Christmas
